summary.span: 提供辅助功能应用程序用于为残障用户调整应用程序的用户界面 (UI) 的信息。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust an application's user interface (UI) for users with impairments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 辅助功能应用程序可以调整应用程序以提高可用性为残障用户的功能。Accessibility applications can adjust features of the application to improve usability for users with disabilities. 对于有视觉障碍的用户，可以调整以符合其需求的软件和操作系统功能。For users who are visually impaired, you can adjust software and operating system features to comply with their needs. 例如，您可以放大文本和图像并进行呈现与形成对比。For example, you can enlarge text and images and render them with a contrast. 此外，可以容纳适当的颜色使用色盲用户的需要。In addition, you can accommodate color-blindness with the appropriate use of colors. 对于有严重视觉障碍的用户，计算机时可通过屏幕检查功能，屏幕上转换为语音或动态的可刷新，盲文显示的文本。For users who are severely visually impaired, computers are accessible with screen review aids that translate on-screen text to speech or to a dynamic, refreshable, Braille display. 对于是听力不好的用户，您可以设计使用视觉提示，如闪烁工具栏; 的程序也可以以文本形式显示语音的消息。For users who are hard of hearing, you can design programs that use visual cues, such as a flashing toolbar; or you can display spoken messages as text. 例如，在开启`SoundSentry`功能，在控制面板中的辅助功能选项提供可视警告系统发出警报声音时。For example, when turned on, the `SoundSentry` feature, an accessibility option in Control Panel, provides a visual warning whenever the system makes an alarm sound. 对于行动不便的用户，您可以设计简化或消除键盘和鼠标使用的控件因此提高了计算机可访问性。For users with motion disabilities, you can design controls that refine or eliminate keyboard and mouse use, thereby improving computer accessibility. 控制面板提供协助。Control Panel offers assistance. 例如，一种替代方法是使用数字键盘而不是鼠标导航。For example, one alternative is to use the numeric keypad instead of the mouse for navigation. 另一种方式称作`StickyKeys`，使用户不能按下两个或多个键 （例如 CTRL + P) 的一次通过一次键入一个密钥来获取相同的结果。Another option, called `StickyKeys`, enables users who cannot hold down two or more keys at a time (such as CTRL+P) to get the same result by typing one key at a time. 对于使用认知的用户和语言障碍，您可以设计更好地满足其需求的软件程序。For users with cognitive and language disabilities, you can design software programs to better accommodate their needs. 例如，使用记忆或带有提示的操作序列化、 简单的显示、 较少的文字和小学标准作为目标读取级别可以有益于这些用户。For example, using conspicuous or cued sequencing, uncomplicated displays, fewer words, and a reading level targeted to elementary school standards can benefit these users. 对于使用癫痫症的用户，您可以设计软件程序来消除导致发病。For users with seizure disorders, you can design software programs to eliminate seizure provoking patterns. 有关可访问性，包括有关辅助功能应用程序的信息的详细信息请参阅 MSDN 库中或在 Microsoft 网站上的 Microsoft 辅助功能的文档。For more information about accessibility, including information about accessibility applications, see the documentation for Microsoft Accessibility in the MSDN library or at the Microsoft Web site. > [!NOTE] > 若要使用，必须添加对的引用`Accessibility`随一起安装的程序集[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To use the , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. Windows 窗体仅支持 Active Accessibility 2.0。Windows Forms only supports Active Accessibility 2.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，当使用此方法以创建可访问对象，提供自己的实现的属性和方法的类以提供特定于你的应用程序的功能。Typically, when you use this method to create an accessible object, you are providing your own implementations of the properties and methods of the class to provide functionality specific to your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值类型属性依赖于具有键盘焦点的对象。The return value type of the property depends on the object that has keyboard focus. 下表描述了该对象类型的属性返回。The following table describes the object types that the property returns. |类型Type|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| |`null`|此对象不具有键盘焦点本身并不包含具有键盘焦点的子级。This object does not have the keyboard focus itself and does not contain a child that has the keyboard focus.| |整数integer|如果当前对象具有键盘焦点，则为 0否则为具有键盘焦点的子辅助性对象的子 ID。0 if the current object has keyboard focus; otherwise, the child ID of the child accessible object with keyboard focus.| ||具有键盘焦点的子辅助性对象。The child accessible object that has the keyboard focus.| 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下内容说明了值，以在调用时指定`Select`执行复杂的选择操作。The following describes which values to specify when calling `Select` to perform complex selection operations. |操作Operation|标志组合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模拟单击To simulate a click| OR OR | |若要通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来选择目标项目To select a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来取消选择的目标项To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL+click| OR OR | |若要模拟 SHIFT + 单击To simulate SHIFT+click| OR OR | |选择范围内的对象，并将焦点放在最后一个对象To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上要设置选择定位点的起始对象。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然后再次调用选择并指定或上的最后一个对象。Then call Select again and specify OR on the last object.| |若要取消选择所有对象To deselect all objects|指定上任何对象。Specify on any object. 此标志可取消选择除刚才所选的所有选定的对象。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然后再次调用选择并指定对同一对象。Then call Select again and specify on the same object.| 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取辅助性对象的位置和大小。

span.span: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.

value.span: 表示辅助性对象的边界的 。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索屏幕坐标中的对象的边框。The property retrieves the object's bounding rectangle in screen coordinates. 如果对象具有非矩形形状，则该属性表示完全涵盖了整个对象区域的最小矩形。If the object has a nonrectangular shape, then this property represents the smallest rectangle that completely encompasses the entire object region. 因此，对于如列表视图项的非矩形对象，该对象的边界矩形的坐标可以如果失败测试，通过调用方法，因为确定像素的基础上的对象的边界。Therefore, for nonrectangular objects such as list view items, the coordinates of the object's bounding rectangle can fail, if tested, by calling the method, because determines the object's boundaries on a pixel-by-pixel basis. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码片段演示如何重写属性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取描述对象默认操作的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.

summary.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

value.span: 对对象默认操作的描述；如果此对象没有默认操作，则为 。

span.span: A description of the default action for an object, or if this object has no default action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该字符串描述对象，该对象不是作为结果执行的操作。The string describes the action that is performed on an object, not what the object does as a result. 打印文档的工具栏按钮，即具有的默认操作是"Press"而不是"将打印当前文档"。That is, a toolbar button that prints a document has a default action of "Press" rather than "Prints the current document." 不要混淆及其值的对象的默认操作。Do not confuse an object's default action with its value.

exception.span: 无法检索控件的默认操作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 默认实现返回可访问对象的默认操作，如果该对象包装的默认操作; 一个系统控件否则，它将返回。

span.span: The default implementation returns the accessible object's default action if the object wraps a system control that has a default action; otherwise, it returns .

para.span: 执行操作的控件应支持此方法。

span.span: Only controls that perform actions should support this method.

para.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作，而某些对象可能都具有与相关的默认操作其属性，如以下示例所示的此类： 选中的复选框，并且在"取消选中"默认操作的值为"选中。

span.span: Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."

para.span: 已清除的复选框将没有默认操作的"检查"，值为"未选中。

span.span: A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."

para.span: 标记为"打印"按钮不带有任何值具有"Press，"默认操作。

span.span: A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value.

para.span: 静态文本控件或编辑控件显示"打印机"没有默认操作，但会具有值为"打印机。

span.span: A static text control or an edit control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."

para.span: 对象的属性应为谓词或谓词短语。

span.span: An object's property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.

para.span: 说明通常用于为视力较差或盲人用户提供更大的上下文。

span.span: The description is typically used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users.

para.span: 它还可以使用上下文搜索或其他应用程序。

span.span: It can also be used for context searching or other applications.

para.span: 服务器需要支持冗余是否在说明不明显，或者基于属性的对象上， ， ，和属性。

span.span: Servers need to support the property if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties.

para.span: 例如，一个具有"确定"按钮不需要的其他信息，但显示了兰图片的按钮将。

span.span: For example, a button with "OK" does not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.

para.span: ， ，但也可能兰按钮的属性描述其用途，但属性传达不太明确，像"显示图片的兰的按钮"的信息。

span.span: The , , and perhaps properties for the cactus button describe its purpose, but the property conveys information that is less tangible, like "A button that shows a picture of a cactus".

summary.span: 执行与该辅助性对象相关的默认操作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端可以通过检查对象的检索对象的默认操作属性。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 客户端可以使用自动化 （如果支持） 而不是以执行对象的默认操作。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 但是，提供了一种简单的方法来执行对象的最常用于操作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

exception.span: 无法执行该控件的默认操作。

span.span: The default action for the control cannot be performed.

para.span: 由系统提供用户界面元素的默认操作取决于键盘状态。

span.span: The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state.

para.span: 也就是说，如 SHIFT 修改键，alt 键或 CTRL 是否按下 （不管是由用户操作或以编程方式） 时调用时，默认值操作可能与这些密钥不向下相同。

span.span: That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down.

para.span: 并非所有对象都有默认操作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

span.span: Returns if no object has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键盘焦点的概念与有关的活动窗口。The concept of keyboard focus is related to that of an active window. 活动窗口是用户正在前台窗口。An active window is the foreground window in which the user is working. 具有键盘焦点的对象是活动窗口或活动窗口的子对象。The object with the keyboard focus is either the active window or a child object of the active window. 在任一时刻，只能有一个对象或容器中的项可以具有焦点。Only one object or item within a container can have the focus at any one time. 具有键盘焦点的对象不一定是所选的对象。The object with the keyboard focus is not necessarily the selected object.

exception.span: 无法检索控件。

span.span: The control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 可接收键盘焦点的所有对象都必须都支持此属性。

span.span: All objects that can receive the keyboard focus must support this property.

span.span: The shortcut key or access key for the accessible object, or if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问密钥，也称为助记键，是菜单、 菜单项、 一个按钮或一些其他控件的标签文本中带下划线的字符。An access key, also known as a mnemonic, is an underlined character in the text of a menu, menu item, label of a button, or some other control. 例如，用户可以显示一个菜单，通过按 ALT 键的同时按指示带下划线的键，如 ALT + F，若要打开`File`菜单。For example, a user can display a menu by pressing the ALT key while also pressing the indicated underlined key, such as ALT+F, to open the `File` menu. 若要使用的菜单项的访问密钥，包含的项菜单上必须处于活动状态。To use the access key of a menu item, the menu containing the item must be active. 工具栏按钮和菜单项控件通常具有关联的快捷键。Controls such as toolbar buttons and menu items often have an associated shortcut key. 菜单项可以具有的访问密钥和与之相关联的快捷键。A menu item can have both an access key and a shortcut key associated with it. 如果的值属性为单个字符，则可以认为它是访问密钥。If the value of the property is a single character, you can assume it is an access key.

exception.span: 无法检索控件的快捷方式。

span.span: The shortcut for the control cannot be retrieved.

para.span: 具有快捷键或访问键的所有对象都应都支持此属性。

span.span: All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是客户端用来识别、 查找或通告的用户对象的字符串。The property is a string used by clients to identify, find, or announce an object for the user. 若要访问子对象的名称，必须首先调用与要检索其名称的子级的索引。To access the name of a child object, you must first call with the index of the child whose name you are retrieving. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码片段演示如何重写属性。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the property. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. para.span: 对象的名称应为直观，以便用户了解对象的含义或用途。

span.span: An object's name should be intuitive so that users understand the object's meaning or purpose.

para.span: 此外，确保属性是相对于任何同级对象的父代中唯一的。

span.span: Also, ensure that the property is unique relative to any sibling objects in the parent.

para.span: 表中的导航提供了一些用户极其困难的问题。

span.span: Navigation within tables presents especially difficult problems for some users.

para.span: 因此，server 开发人员应使表单元格名称尽可能具有描述性。

span.span: Therefore, server developers should make table cell names as descriptive as possible.

para.span: 例如，可以通过合并的行和列占据，例如"A1。"的名称创建单元名称

span.span: For example, you might create a cell name by combining the names of the row and column it occupies, such as "A1."

para.span: 但是，它是通常最好使用更具说明性的名称，例如"Karin，年 2 月。"

span.span: However, it is generally better to use more descriptive names, such as "Karin, February."

para.span: 多个对象，例如图标、 菜单、 复选框、 组合框和其他控件中，已向用户显示的标签。

span.span: Many objects, such as icons, menus, check boxes, combo boxes, and other controls, have labels that are displayed to users.

para.span: 向用户显示任何标签应用于对象的属性。

span.span: Any label displayed to users should be used for the object's property.

para.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅属性。

span.span: For more information, see the Property.

para.span: 如果您使用的菜单或按钮文本属性，请抽出 & 符 (&) 标记键盘访问键。

span.span: If you are using menu or button text for the property, strip out the ampersands (&) that mark the keyboard access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航栏中，空间和逻辑，始终被限制到容器中的用户界面元素。Navigation, both spatial and logical, is always restricted to the user interface elements within a container. 与空间导航栏中，客户端只能定位到起始对象的同级。With spatial navigation, clients can navigate only to a sibling of the starting object. 具体取决于用于逻辑导航导航标志，客户端可以导航到的子级或同级起始对象。Depending on the navigational flag used with logical navigation, clients can navigate to either a child or to a sibling of the starting object. 此方法不更改选定内容或焦点。This method does not change the selection or focus. 若要更改焦点或选择一个对象，请使用。To change the focus or to select an object, use . 方法检索仅用户界面元素具有定义的屏幕位置。The method retrieves only user interface elements that have a defined screen location. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 重写此代码演示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用此方法来执行复杂的选择操作。Applications can use this method to perform complex selection operations. 以下内容说明了值，以在调用时指定执行复杂的选择操作。The following describes which values to specify when calling to perform complex selection operations. |操作Operation|标志组合Flag Combination| |---------------|----------------------| |若要模拟单击To simulate a click| `OR` **注意：** 如果从自己的应用程序中调用，这种组合将选择所需的控制。 `OR` **Note:** This combination will not select the desired control if called from within your own application. 但是，如果从外部应用程序调用，它将具有所需的效果。It will have the desired effect, however, if called from an external application.| |若要通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来选择目标项目To select a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |通过模拟 CTRL + 单击来取消选择的目标项To cancel selection of a target item by simulating CTRL + click| `OR` `OR` | |若要模拟 SHIFT + 单击To simulate SHIFT + click| `OR` `OR` | |选择范围内的对象，并将焦点放在最后一个对象To select a range of objects and put focus on the last object|指定上要设置选择定位点的起始对象。Specify on the starting object to set the selection anchor. 然后调用再次并指定 `OR` 上的最后一个对象。Then call again and specify `OR` on the last object.| |若要取消选择所有对象To deselect all objects|指定上任何对象。Specify on any object. 此标志可取消选择除刚才所选的所有选定的对象。This flag deselects all selected objects except the one just selected. 然后调用再次并指定对同一对象。Then call again and specify on the same object.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类，以公开访问的信息。The following example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供自定义访问图表控件的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为不是实际图表图例-基于控制，但改为绘制由图表控件，它没有任何内置的可访问信息。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not have any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类将重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，它表示每个部分的图例可访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用该控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 重写此代码演示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 请参阅完整的代码示例的类概述。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `invokeAttr` 参数可以是构造函数、方法、属性或字段。The `invokeAttr` parameter may be a constructor, method, property, or field. 必须指定合适的调用属性。A suitable invocation attribute must be specified. 通过将空字符串 ("") 作为成员的名称传递来调用类的默认成员。Invoke the default member of a class by passing the empty string ("") as the name of the member. `modifiers`参数具有相同的长度`args`参数，表示被调用的成员的元数据中的参数属性。The `modifiers` parameter has the same length as the `args` parameter, representing the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata. 参数可以具有以下属性： pdIn，pdOut，pdRetval，pdOptional，和 pdHasDefault。A parameter can have the following attributes: pdIn, pdOut, pdRetval, pdOptional, and pdHasDefault. 这些属性分别表示 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和默认参数。These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively. 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器应用程序可以调用此函数，在其中包含类似于一个系统提供的对象的自定义用户界面对象。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 服务器应用程序调用`CreateStdAccessibleObject`并重写方法和属性，以匹配其自定义对象。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 该方法节约 server 开发人员的完全实现所有工作属性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 此函数是类似于`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`，只不过`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`可用于指定类名称作为参数，而`CreateStdAccessibleObject`使用与关联的类名称`hwnd`。This function is similar to `CreateStdAccessibleProxy`, except that `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` enables you to specify the class name as a parameter, whereas `CreateStdAccessibleObject` uses the class name associated with the `hwnd`. 调用此版本的`UseStdAccessible`调用 objid 客户端使用的两个参数版本相同。Calling this version of the `UseStdAccessible` is the same as calling the two parameter version with an objid of CLIENT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的方法和属性系统提供的用户界面元素的指定类型创建可访问对象。Creates an accessible object with the methods and properties for the specified type of system-provided user interface element. 服务器应用程序可以调用此函数，在其中包含类似于一个系统提供的对象的自定义用户界面对象。Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object. 服务器应用程序调用`CreateStdAccessibleObject`并重写方法和属性，以匹配其自定义对象。Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the methods and properties as needed to match their custom object. 该方法节约 server 开发人员的完全实现所有工作属性和方法。This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the properties and methods. 有效`objid`值。Valid `objid` values. |对象Object|“值”Value|描述Description| |------------|-----------|-----------------| |发出警报ALERT|0xFFFFFFF60xFFFFFFF6|是指与窗口或应用程序关联的消息。Refers to a message associated with a window or application.| |插入符号CARET|0xFFFFFFF80xFFFFFFF8|指的是文本插入栏 （脱字号），在窗口中。Refers to the text insertion bar (caret) in the window.| |客户端CLIENT|0xFFFFFFFC0xFFFFFFFC|表示窗口的工作区。Refers to the window's client area. 在大多数情况下，由操作系统控制框架元素，并在客户端对象包含应用程序控制的所有元素。In most cases, the operating system controls the frame elements, and the client object contains all elements that the application controls.| |游标CURSOR|0xFFFFFFF70xFFFFFFF7|表示鼠标指针。Refers to the mouse pointer. 在系统中没有只有一个鼠标指针，它不是窗口的子级。There is only one mouse pointer in the system and it is not a child of a window.| |HSCROLLHSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFA0xFFFFFFFA|是指窗口的水平滚动条。Refers to the window's horizontal scroll bar.| |MENUMENU|0xFFFFFFFD0xFFFFFFFD|是指窗口的菜单栏。Refers to the window's menu bar.| |SIZEGRIPSIZEGRIP|0xFFFFFFF90xFFFFFFF9|是指窗口的大小手柄，位于窗口框架的右下角的可选框架组件。Refers to the window's size grip, an optional frame component located at the lower right corner of the window frame.| |声音SOUND|0xFFFFFFF50xFFFFFFF5|是指 sound 对象。Refers to a sound object. 声音对象没有所需的屏幕位置或子级，但具有名称和状态属性。Sound objects do not have screen locations or children, but do have name and state attributes. 它们是应用程序播放声音的子级。They are children of the application playing the sound.| |SYSMENUSYSMENU|0xFFFFFFFF0xFFFFFFFF|是指窗口的系统菜单。Refers to the window's system menu.| |标题栏TITLEBAR|0xFFFFFFFE0xFFFFFFFE|是指窗口的标题栏。Refers to the window's title bar.| |VSCROLLVSCROLL|0xFFFFFFFB0xFFFFFFFB|是指窗口的垂直滚动条。Refers to the window's vertical scroll bar.| |窗口WINDOW|0x000000000x00000000|引用窗口本身，而不是子对象。Refers to the window itself rather than to a child object.|

value.span: 可访问对象的值，或如果该对象未设值，则为 。

span.span: The value of an accessible object, or if the object has no value set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，属性表示该对象包含的可视信息。Typically, the property represents visual information contained by the object. 并非所有对象都支持属性。Not all objects support the property. 在大多数情况下，使用属性需要了解的可视信息对象包含有关客户端。In most cases, the property is used to tell the client about what visual information an object contains. 例如，一个编辑控件的值是它所包含的文本，但菜单项包含任何值。For example, the value for an edit control is the text it contains, but a menu item has no value. 属性可以提供在如树视图控件的情况下层次结构信息。The property can provide hierarchical information in cases such as a tree view control. 尽管在树视图控件中的父对象不提供中的信息属性，该控件中的每个项目具有一个从零开始的值，表示在层次结构中的其级别。Although the parent object in the tree view control does not provide information in the property, each item within the control has a zero-based value that represents its level within the hierarchy. 顶级项的值为零，第二个级别的项具有值 1，等等。Top-level items have a value of zero, second-level items have a value of one, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 返回的值从滚动条和 trackbar 可访问对象表示的是百分比，因此它们是介于 0 和 100 (含) 之间的整数。The values returned from scroll bar and trackbar accessible objects indicate percentages, so they are integers between 0 and 100, inclusive.

exception.span: 无法设置或检索值。

span.span: The value cannot be set or retrieved.
